briefdescription.para: enables timer by setting "TE" bit in the CTRL register to 1

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of TMR32 registers.

briefdescription.para: enables timer re-start; used in the one-shot mode to restart the timer.

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of TMR32 registers.

briefdescription.para: enables PWM0 by setting "P0E" bit in the CTRL register to 1

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of TMR32 registers.

briefdescription.para: enables PWM1 by setting "P1E" bit in the CTRL register to 1

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of TMR32 registers.

briefdescription.para: enables deadtime by setting "DTE" bit in the CTRL register to 1

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of TMR32 registers.

briefdescription.para: invert PWM0 by setting "P0I" bit in the CTRL register to 1

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of TMR32 registers.

briefdescription.para: invert PWM1 by setting "P1I" bit in the CTRL register to 1

parameterdescription.para: The base memory address of TMR32 registers.
